instructions: Open the dialer from the home screen. Tap the overflow menu (three vertical dots on the right). Choose Settings . How to enable Caller ID and spam protection on the Galaxy S20 Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central Toggle Caller ID and spam protection to On . Read Hiya's privacy policy and select the boxes . Hit Agree to finish. How to enable Caller ID and spam protection on the Galaxy S20 Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central
